levels.title: Getting Started
levels.subtitle: Your First Tool Server
levels.description: Learn the basics of MCP by building a simple server that gives an AI the ability to look up information.

phases.title: What is MCP?
phases.description: Understand what the Model Context Protocol is and why it matters.

phases.title: Setting Up Your Tools
phases.description: Install the software you need to start building.

phases.title: Your First Function
phases.description: Write your first tool that an AI can use.

phases.title: Testing Your Server
phases.description: Use the MCP Inspector to make sure everything works.

phases.title: Connecting to an AI
phases.description: Hook your server up to Claude Desktop so the AI can use your tools.

levels.title: Working with Files
levels.subtitle: File Access Server
levels.description: Build a server that lets an AI read files from your computer safely.

phases.title: Actions vs Data
phases.description: Learn the difference between tools that do things and resources that share data.

phases.title: Project Setup
phases.description: Set up a new project with sample files for the AI to read.

phases.title: Listing Files
phases.description: Create a resource that shows the AI what files are available.

phases.title: Reading Files Safely
phases.description: Let the AI read file contents while keeping your system secure.

phases.title: Putting It Together
phases.description: Test your complete file server and connect it to Claude Desktop.

levels.title: Connecting to APIs
levels.subtitle: API Integration Server
levels.description: Build a server that fetches live data from the internet for your AI to use.

phases.title: Why Connect to APIs?
phases.description: Understand why giving an AI access to live data is so powerful.

phases.title: Getting API Keys
phases.description: Sign up for free API accounts and configure your project.

phases.title: Fetching Weather Data
phases.description: Build a tool that gets current weather for any city.

phases.title: Adding News and Caching
phases.description: Add a news tool and learn how to avoid making too many requests.

phases.title: Testing Everything
phases.description: Test all your tools together and connect to Claude Desktop.

levels.title: Going Live
levels.subtitle: Production Deployment
levels.description: Put your server on the internet so it can be accessed from anywhere.

phases.title: What is Deployment?
phases.description: Learn what it means to put your server on the internet.

phases.title: Packaging with Docker
phases.description: Package your server so it runs the same way everywhere.

phases.title: Remote Connections
phases.description: Change your server so it can be reached over the internet.

phases.title: Deploying to the Cloud
phases.description: Upload your server to Railway and make it live.

phases.title: You Did It!
phases.description: Celebrate what you have built and explore what comes next.

levels.title: Working with AI Helpers
levels.subtitle: Advanced Agent Systems
levels.description: Learn how to build tools that use AI helpers (agents) to do complex tasks automatically.

phases.title: Understanding AI Helpers
phases.description: Learn what agents are and when to use them instead of regular tools.

phases.title: Your First Agent Tool
phases.description: Build a tool that calls an AI helper to review your code.

phases.title: Controlling Agents with Code
phases.description: Use the Agent SDK to control AI helpers from your Python programs.

phases.title: Multiple Agents Working Together
phases.description: Build a system where different AI helpers work together on the same task.

phases.title: Building Real Agent Systems
phases.description: Create production-ready tools that use agents safely and efficiently.
